Today in Pembrokeshire, it's a quiet one with 2 ft @6s WNW swell across the board and light 9 mph NNW winds. Tomorrow remains similar, with the same swell size but dropping to 5s and a light 7 mph NE wind. Day after, conditions worsen with 2 ft @5s WNW and fresh 18 mph NW winds, making it blown out. Best: today.
